Method.Source:
public container getDefaultingDependencies() { return [ // [field that needs defaulting, // [fields that affect the default value]]
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductType)],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ServiceType), fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductType)],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductSubType)],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductSearchName), [fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductName)]],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, VariantConfigurationTechnology), [fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductSubType)]],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, IsCatchWeightProduct), [fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductType), fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, IsProductKit)]],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductDimensionGroupName), [fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, IsProductKit), fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, RetailProductCategoryname)]],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, StorageDimensionGroupName), [fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, RetailProductCategoryname)]],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, TrackingDimensionGroupName), [fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, RetailProductCategoryname)]],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductSizeGroupId), [fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, RetailProductCategoryname)]],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductStyleGroupId), [fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, RetailProductCategoryname)]],
[fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, ProductColorGroupId), [fieldNum(EcoResProductEntity, RetailProductCategoryname)]] ]; }
